item.title: Bottled Twilight
item.fluff: This black glass bottle holds the power to turn all light to dusk

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou remove the cork from the bottle, and until the end of the encounter all light within 10 squares of the bottle becomes dim light.

item.title: Fortune's Nod
item.fluff: You have been gifted fortune, but it only occasionally manifests in noticeably ways

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a saving throw and dislike the result
EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to the triggering saving throw.

item.title: Gather Flames
item.fluff: You reach out and pluck a flame from its fuel source, then effortlessly carry it to a new location

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou pick up and adjacent fire that can be as large as a torch flame, carrying it with a free hand without being burned. If you are still carrying the fire at the end of the encounter, the fire goes out.

The fire requires no fuel while you carry it. You can place it on a surface or an unattended object as a minor action. You cannot place it on a creature. Once out of your hand, the fire requires fuel as normal.

item.title: Know the Path
item.fluff: You can sense the way that you must go as clearly as if someone was pulling you towards your destination

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou utter the name of a specific location you have visited in the past week and that is on the same place as you. If you utter the name of the same place on consecutive days, you can keep doing so even if it has been more than a week.
Level 10In the past year and a day.
Level 15A specific location that you have seen before and that is on the same place as you.
Until you take an extended rest, you can sense the general direction and distance to that location.

item.title: Mount Growth
item.fluff: You imbue a tiny creature with the power of nature, and it grows to such a size that you can ride it

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectChoose one non-hostile Tiny natural beast within 5 squares of you that is on a surface that can support a Large creature.
Level 9Choose up to two beasts.
Level 14Choose up to six beasts.
Until your next extended rest, the target becomes Large, gains the Mount keyword, and acts as a willing mount under your instruction. The creature has the same statistics as a riding horse.

item.title: Ride the Wind
item.fluff: You whisper quiet words to a group of mounts, giving them the ability to run like the wind

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 10 (up to 8 creatures with the Mount subtype); Each target gains a +2 bonus to speed for 8 hours.

item.title: Scent of Gold
item.fluff: You've got a nose for gold, allowing you to ferret out hidden valuables

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectFor the next 10 minutes, you can smell the presence of gold, silver, and valuable gems within 5 squares of you. This allows you to make Perception checks to locate such valuables, even when they are hidden from view.
Level 13This power becomes an encounter power.
Level 23Within 10 squares of you.

item.title: Soothe the Savage Beast
item.fluff: This song from the Feywild lulls an animal into complacency with its dulcet tones

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 5 (one beast); item's level +3 vs. Will
HitThe target cannot make attacks (save ends).
This effect immediately ends if the target is attacked.

item.title: Speak with Animals
item.fluff: You speak to a creature using the language of animals, learning information from an unlikely source

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectFor the next 10 minutes, you can understand the barks, chirps, roars, and other animal sounds of natural beasts, and they can understand your speech.
Level 9Next 1 hour.
Level 14Next 1 hour, and both natural and fey beasts.
This power does not affect the beasts' attitude toward you.

item.title: Speak with Sentinels
item.fluff: You listen to what the shapes of stone and straw have to say, learning what recently transpired nearby

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectFor the next 10 minutes, you can speak with statues, scarecrows, and other objects that look like creatures.
Level 15 or 25Next 1 hour.

They animate enough to speak, and they display moderate intelligence. You can question them what has transpired within the last 24 hours in their immediate surroundings. Their knowledge includes only things that would be obvious to normal senses. For instance, they would know that a horseman passed by an hour ago, but they would not know that an invisible creature sneaked past.
Level 25Within the past week.

item.title: Stallion's Breath
item.fluff: Your exhalation contains the hot breath of a champion stallion that gives your mount a quick burst of speed

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be mounted.
EffectMelee 1 (the mount you are riding); The target immediately takes a move action.

item.title: True Kiss of the Mistress
item.fluff: A member of fey royalty gave you his or her true kiss of trust, imparting wards of protection against enemies that would harm you - even if you later break that trust

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that immobilize, restrain, slow, or stun.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou take damage from an attack and the attacker has combat advantage against you
EffectThe attacker is dazed until the end of its next turn, and you can shift 1 square.
Level 8Shift up to 3 squares.
Level 13Shift up to 5 squares.
Level 18Teleport up to 5 squares. This power gains the Teleportation keyword.
Level 23Teleport up to 7 squares. This power gains the Teleportation keyword.
Level 2828eleport up to 10 squares. This power gains the Teleportation keyword.

item.title: Whispers in the Willows
item.fluff: Your words are absorbed intot he bark of a nearby tree, then quickly travel by root and earth to a friend

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou utter a phrase of no more than twenty words to a tree adjacent to you. Then, choose another tree you have seen on the same plane, and any number of creatures.
Level 15Of no more than a hundred words.
When any chosen creature moves adjacent to the chosen tree within the next 24 hours, the tree repeats your words. Creatures around the chosen creature can also hear the words.
Level 10 or 15Within the next week.
